executors.name: main
executors.exec_start:
if pidof sysinner-httplb; then
    exit 0
fi

mkdir -p /home/action/apps/openresty/
rsync -av {{.inpack_prefix_openresty}}/* /home/action/apps/openresty/

mkdir -p /home/action/apps/sysinner-httplb/
rsync -av {{.inpack_prefix_sysinner_httplb}}/* /home/action/apps/sysinner-httplb/

/home/action/apps/sysinner-httplb/bin/sysinner-httplb > /dev/null 2>&1 &

sleep 1
exit 0
